nodes.text: Mercury (Hg) was a liquid metal element at room temperatures. It was poisonous to Humans; however some lifeforms like the Polydroxols evolved in mercury-rich environments. It flowed on the Cinnabar Moon. The mantle and much of the surface of Fiddanl in the Yavin system was composed of a massive sea of boiling mercury.
On board the Lido Deck of the Galaxy Tours cruiseliner, the Kuari Princess, there existed for passengers competition-sized swimming tanks that contained mercury and ammonia.
